description: This down jacket is built with our most advanced thermal-reflective technology for the mountain. The waterproof-breathable outer shell blocks out rain, sleet, snow, and anything else the mountain throws at you. Comfy 550 fill power down insulation warms you up, and the hood is helmet compatible.
name: Columbia Sportswear Roaring Fork Down Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 550 Fill Power Down Insulation, RDS Certified
